verses.t: Now{G1161} we beseech{G2065} you{G5209}, brethren{G80}, by{G5228} the coming{G3588} of our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, and{G2532} by our{G2257} gathering together{G1997} unto{G1909} him{G846},

That{G1519} ye{G5209} be{G4531} not{G3361} soon{G5030} shaken{G4531} in{G575} mind{G3588}, or{G3383} be troubled{G2360}, neither{G3383} by{G1223} spirit{G4151}, nor{G3383} by{G1223} word{G3056}, nor{G3383} by{G1223} letter{G1992} as{G5613} from{G1223} us{G2257}, as{G5613} that{G3754} the day{G3588} of Christ{G3588} is at hand{G1764}.

Let{G1818} no{G3361} man{G5100} deceive{G1818} you{G5209} by{G2596} any{G3367} means{G5158}: for{G3754} that day shall not come, except{G1437} there come{G2064} a falling away{G3588} first{G4412}, and{G2532} that man{G3588} of sin{G3588} be revealed{G601}, the son{G3588} of perdition{G3588};KJV rendered EAN MH as "except"; of course, only one Greek word can be tagged to it -- I chose EAN

Who opposeth{G480}and{G2532} exalteth himself{G5229} above{G1909} all{G3956} that is called{G3004} God{G2316}, or{G2228} that is worshipped{G4574}; so that{G5620} he{G846} as{G5613} God{G2316} sitteth{G2523} in{G1519} the temple{G3588} of God{G3588}, shewing{G584} himself{G1438} that{G3754} he is{G2076} God{G2316}.
Remember ye{G3421} not{G3756}, that{G3754}, when I was{G5607} yet{G2089} with{G4314} you{G5209}, I told{G3004} you{G5213} these things{G5023}?
And{G2532} now{G3568} ye know{G1492} what withholdeth{G2722} that{G1519} he{G846} might be revealed{G601} in{G1722} his{G1438} time{G2540}.

For{G1063} the mystery{G3466} of iniquity{G3588} doth{G1754} already{G2235} work{G1754}: only{G3440} he who{G2722} now{G737} letteth{G2722} will let, until{G2193} he be taken{G1096} out of{G1537} the way{G3319}.

And{G2532} then{G5119} shall{G601} that Wicked{G459} be revealed{G601}, whom{G3739} the Lord{G3588} shall consume{G355} with the spirit{G3588} of his{G846} mouth{G3588}, and{G2532} shall destroy{G2673} with the brightness{G3588} of his{G846} coming{G3588}:
Even him, whose{G3739} coming{G3588} is{G2076} after{G2596} the working{G1753} of Satan{G3588} with{G1722} all{G3956} power{G1411} and{G2532} signs{G4592} and{G2532} lying{G5579} wonders{G5059},

And{G2532} with{G1722} all{G3956} deceivableness{G539} of unrighteousness{G3588} in{G1722} them that perish{G622}; because{G473} they received{G1209} not{G3756} the love{G3588} of the truth{G3588}, that{G1519} they{G846} might be saved{G4982}.ANJ WN appears to be rendered together as "because" (I could be wrong: the KJV wording is very awkward here); at any rate, WN was left untagged
And{G2532} for{G1223} this{G5124} cause{G1223} God{G3588} shall send{G3992} them{G846} strong{G1753} delusion{G4106}, that{G1519} they{G846} should believe{G4100} a lie{G3588}:
That{G2443} they{G2919} all{G3956} might be damned{G2919} who believed{G4100} not{G3361} the truth{G3588}, but{G235} had pleasure{G2106} in{G1722} unrighteousness{G3588}.

But{G1161} we{G2249} are bound{G3784} to give thanks{G2168} alway{G3842} to God{G3588} for{G4012} you{G5216}, brethren{G80} beloved{G25} of{G5259} the Lord{G2962}, because{G3754} God{G3588} hath{G138} from{G575} the beginning{G746} chosen{G138} you{G5209} to{G1519} salvation{G4991} through{G1722} sanctification{G38} of the Spirit{G4151} and{G2532} belief{G4102} of the truth{G225}:

Whereunto{G1519} he called{G2564} you{G5209} by{G1223} our{G2257} gospel{G3588}, to{G1519} the obtaining{G4047} of the glory{G1391} of our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}.Yet another awkward rendering by KJV of EIS hO; this time as "whereunto"; I've tagged EIS, leaving hO untagged

Therefore{G3767}, brethren{G80}, stand fast{G4739}, and{G2532} hold{G2902} the traditions{G3588} which{G3739} ye have been taught{G1321}, whether{G1535} by{G1223} word{G3056}, or{G1535} our{G2257} epistle{G1992}.ARA was left untagged since I chose to tag OUN to "Therefore". DI' was left untranslated by KJV and so cannot be tagged either

Now{G1161} our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} himself{G846}and{G2532} God{G3588}, even{G2532} our{G2257} Father{G3962}, which hath loved{G25} us{G2248}, and{G2532} hath given{G1325} us everlasting{G166} consolation{G3874} and{G2532} good{G18} hope{G1680} through{G1722} grace{G5485},
Comfort{G3870} your{G5216} hearts{G3588}, and{G2532} stablish{G4741} you{G5209} in{G1722} every{G3956} good{G18} word{G3056} and{G2532} work{G2041}.
